name: Edpuzzle
headline: Make any video your lesson.
description: In Edpuzzle, you can make any video your lesson. We combine simple video-editing tools with powerful analytics so that a teacher can take a video and make it personal, engaging and effective. Together we are building a pool of the best video lessons for the classroom. We are working towards a day where every teacher and student will be just a click away from an excellent online education.

founders.name: Santi Herrero, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Co-Founder & CTO @ Edpuzzle (Working from Edpuzzle's Barcelona office)

generated_description:
**Edpuzzle**: Turning Any Video into an Engaging Lesson

Founded in 2013 and based in San Francisco, Edpuzzle has emerged as a transformative tool in the education space, leveraging the power of video to enhance teaching and learning. The company's mission is simple yet profound: **"Make any video your lesson."** This mission encapsulates their vision of making quality education accessible and engaging for both teachers and students.

### What Does Edpuzzle Do?

Edpuzzle enables educators to take existing videos and enhance them with interactive features like embedded questions, notes, and assessments. It combines user-friendly video-editing tools with robust analytics, allowing teachers to customize lessons that resonate with their students. Teachers have access to one of the largest libraries of video lessons across various subjects and grade levels, enhancing the educational experience by promoting engagement and critical thinking.

### Features That Stand Out

1. **Interactivity**: Teachers can incorporate questions at any point in a video, which keeps students engaged and accountable.
2. **Personalization**: Lessons can be tailored to different learning paces and styles, making it easier for students to grasp concepts.
3. **Data Insights**: The platform offers analytics that provide immediate feedback on student performance, helping teachers fine-tune their instruction.
4. **Ease of Use**: With AI-generated questions and autograde features, Edpuzzle streamlines the workload for teachers, giving them more time to focus on teaching.

### A Global Impact

Edpuzzle has truly democratized learning, reaching over 2 million teachers across 188 countries and boasting more than 40 million video lessons created. Each month, students watch over 5 million hours of content, illustrating the platform's extensive reach and effectiveness.

### Join the Movement

With a dedicated team of 40 employees backed by Y Combinator, Edpuzzle continues to innovate in educational technology. The company’s resources and community support teachers globally, making it a vital addition to modern classrooms. 

If you’re interested in transforming your teaching approach, visit [Edpuzzle](https://edpuzzle.com) and see how you can make any video your lesson today. 

In the world of education, Edpuzzle is not just a tool; it's a gateway to engaging and effective learning experiences.
